data.eml:eml: A new species of Dracoderes (Kinorhyncha: Dracoderidae) from Korea provides further support for a dracoderid-homalorhagid relationship

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thomsen, Vibe G., Rho, Hyun Soo, Kim, Dongsung, Sørensen, Martin V. (2013): A new species of Dracoderes (Kinorhyncha: Dracoderidae) from Korea provides further support for a dracoderid-homalorhagid relationship. Zootaxa 3682 (1): 133-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3682.1.6
